summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5608 for the improvement of Waters Avenue, from Fletcher Street to 62nd Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73859, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
